forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low near 25F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -3C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 28F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low -6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low 23F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 19F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low -9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 19F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
